entry.value: select new map(a.id as id,a.articleid as articleid,a.userid as userid,a.commentuser as commentuser,a.comment as comment,a.receiver as receiver,a.approve as approve,a.oppose as oppose,a.currentDate as currentDate,(select b.username from UserInfo b where b.id=a.userid) as username,(select b.picture from UserInfo b where b.id=a.userid) as picture ) from CommentInfo a where a.articleid='{0}' order by a.currentDate desc

select new map(a.id as id,a.userid as userid,a.type as type,c.typename as typename,a.title as title,a.picture as picture,a.text as text,a.tag as tag,a.love as love,a.brower as brower,a.firstDate as firstDate,a.currentDate as currentDate,b.email as email,b.username as username,b.sign as sign,b.job as job,b.intro as intro,b.phone as phone,b.picture as userpicture,(select count(*) from CommentInfo c where c.articleid=a.id) as commentsum) from ArticleInfo a,UserInfo b,ParamsType c where c.typeid='2' and c.id=a.type and a.userid = b.id {0} order by a.firstDate desc
select new map(id as id,typeid as typeid,typename as typename,typedesc as typedesc,updtuser as updtuser,updttime as updttime) from ParamsType where typeid='{0}'

select new map(a.id as id,a.articleid as articleid,a.userid as userid,a.commentuser as commentuser,a.comment as comment,a.receiver as receiver,a.approve as approve,a.oppose as oppose,a.currentDate as currentDate,(select b.username from UserInfo b where b.id=a.userid) as username,(select b.picture from UserInfo b where b.id=a.userid) as picture ) from CommentInfo a order by a.currentDate desc
select new map(count(*) as count, tagname as tagname, id as id, articleid as articleid) from TagInfo group by tagname order by count(*) desc

select distinct new map(a.id as id,a.userid as userid,a.type as type,c.typename as typename,a.title as title,a.picture as picture,a.text as text,a.tag as tag,a.love as love,a.brower as brower,a.firstDate as firstDate,a.currentDate as currentDate,b.email as email,b.username as username,b.sign as sign,b.job as job,b.intro as intro,b.phone as phone,b.picture as userpicture,(select count(*) from CommentInfo c where c.articleid=a.id) as commentsum) from ArticleInfo a,UserInfo b,ParamsType c,TagInfo d where a.id=d.articleid and c.typeid='2' and c.id=a.type and a.userid = b.id {0} order by a.firstDate desc

select new map(a.id as id,a.type as type,a.title as title,a.love as love,a.brower as brower,b.typename as typename,a.currentDate as currentDate,(select count(*) from CommentInfo c where c.articleid=a.id) as commentsum) from ArticleInfo a,ParamsType b where a.type=b.id {0} order by a.currentDate desc
